name: Castle Rabbit Defense of Fortune
description:
Let's be the savior of the Rabbit world.

"Castle Rabbit Defense" is defense game with the most beautiful game graphics infinity good!

The Rabbit Defense is a new challenge as a defense style game, which with the most beautiful game graphics.


The world full of war, the goal is defending castles with request of every lord of castles in the world.
You have to defeat all of the enemies before tearing the castles down.
Will you survive from the war fire with fortune? Will you win infinity with your blade?
Defense your home with catapult and other weapons from attacking!
Save all of the castles from enemies and upgrade units and facilities with money(carrot) which gained by defeating enemies.
Ultimately, eliminate the conspiracy of Ancient Big Cat which is a mother of evil.
Command your knight, bowman to war now! Here comes the CastleStorm!
Can you defense your hometown of fortune with your infinity blade?

Rule of the game

1. You must defend the castle.
"Wave" is that enemy are approaching to the castle continuously.
There are about 18 to 50 Cats (enemy) in a Wave.

2. You can use 5 units which are Soldier, Knight as Assault Units and Archer, Farmer, Sorcerer as Long Range Units.

3. You can block the enemies by placing Assault Units on the field or Long Range Units on the castle. You can upgrade ability of units with money. Protect your muffin! Sometimes, the mutation enemies will drive you crazy!

4. The Farmer has scat Weapon and Meteor with normal attack.
You need to see the magic icon above it. And use unicorn to protect your knight.

5. The Catapult can attack many of the enemies at the same time.
You can upgrade It's capacity, accuracy, power, reload time with money.

6. You can build the tower on field side with a big money (carrot).
You can place long range units on the tower in the path of cats.
It makes easy to defend castle and your food muffin.

7. If the castle durability gage becomes zero by the cat's attack, then the game is over. Be caution of the mutation cat! Command your bowman to shoot the enemy!
